column5: Come stay like a KING or a QUEEN on KINGSWAY DR in The East Room, with a queen size bed and a share bathroom with shower/tubmiles to miles to AT&T stadium, Globe Life Ballpark, Six Flags  11 miles to Verizon/Nokia Theater 17 miles to DFW 21 miles to downtown Dallas 14 miles to downtown Fort Worth We can arrange pick-ups from anywhere in the DFW area as well as the airports for an additional fee. See the Getting Around section below
column8: Arlington btwn Dallas & Ft Worth*The East Room
